NetSparkleUpdater.​Configurations.​Configuration
public abstract
NetSparkleUpdater.​Configurations.​Configuration
NetSparkleUpdater.​Configurations.​JSONConfiguration
NetSparkleUpdater.​Configurations.​RegistryConfiguration

Abstract class to handle update intervals and know which is the currently installed version of the software.

Properties
ApplicationName
public string ApplicationName { get; protected set }

The application name

PreviousVersionOfSoftwareRan
public string PreviousVersionOfSoftwareRan { get; protected set }

The previous version of the software that the user ran, e.g. "1.5.2"

InstalledVersion
public string InstalledVersion { get; protected set }

The currently-installed version, e.g. "1.4.3"

CheckForUpdate
public bool CheckForUpdate { get; protected set }

Flag to indicate if we should check for updates

IsFirstRun
public bool IsFirstRun { get; protected set }

True if this is the first time the application has been run based on save config data; false otherwise

LastCheckTime
public DateTime LastCheckTime { get; protected set }

of the last update check

LastVersionSkipped
public string LastVersionSkipped { get; protected set }

The version number of the update that was skipped last.  If the user skipped an update, then the version to ignore is stored here (e.g. "1.4.3")

DidRunOnce
public bool DidRunOnce { get; protected set }

Whether or not the application has run at least one time

LastConfigUpdate
public DateTime LastConfigUpdate { get; protected set }

Last profile update

AssemblyAccessor
public IAssemblyAccessor AssemblyAccessor { get; protected set }

Object that accesses version, title, etc. info for the currently running application (or some other application)

Functions
Configuration
public Configuration(
IAssemblyAccessor assemblyAccessor
)

Constructor for Configuration -- should load all pertinent values by the end of the constructor!  If any exception is thrown during construction of this object (e.g. from the assembly accessors), then CheckForUpdate is set to false.

Parameter
assemblyAccessor
IAssemblyAccessor

Object that accesses version, title, etc. info for the application you would like to check for updates for

TouchProfileTime
public virtual void TouchProfileTime()

Set the last configuration update time to DateTime.Now.

TouchCheckTime
public virtual void TouchCheckTime()

Set the last time we checked for updates to DateTime.Now.  Should be used after an update check has been made.

SetVersionToSkip
public virtual void SetVersionToSkip(
string version
)

Set the given version as the version that should be skipped (ignored) when looking at available updates

Parameter
version
string

the version to skip. e.g. "1.2.3"

Reload
public abstract void Reload()

Reloads the configuration object from disk/memory/etc.

InitWithDefaultValues
protected void InitWithDefaultValues()

Set the configuration values to their default values (should check for update, last check time was in the past, no version skipped, and have never run the software).
